Service Details: - Offers a variety of amenities and hands-on farm activities - Offers a place to spend time in a park-like setting with horses, goats, donkeys and more - Offers hands-on learning about the farm animals and their care- Provides opportunities to participate in workshops such as art, drama, music, wood and more
